attributes.action: Request Ofcom request that onscreen logos i.e. the channel 5 logo and ITV2 logo are removed from programmes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is increasingly common for the free to air television channels to countinue to broadcast their channel ID logo throughout the entire programme, (this is not removable by the viewer as is the case with the interactive red dot) The televison viewing experience is therefore degraded. Additionally at a time when we are progressing towards high definition pictures and bigger screens, it seems rather counter productive to have all this new technology spolit by a distrating logo.
Therefore please request that Ofcom request these logos (DOGS as they are known) are removed from our screens.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
